verses.verse: Ho <WH1945>, every one that thirsteth <WH6771>, come <WH3212> <WH8798> ye to the waters <WH4325>, and he that hath no money <WH3701>; come <WH3212> <WH8798> ye, buy <WH7666> <WH8798>, and eat <WH398> <WH8798>; yea, come <WH3212> <WH8798>, buy <WH7666> <WH8798> wine <WH3196> and milk <WH2461> without money <WH3701> and without price <WH4242>.

Wherefore do ye spend <WH8254> <WH8799> money <WH3701> for that which is not bread <WH3899>? and your labour <WH3018> for that which satisfieth <WH7654> not <WH3808>? hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> diligently <WH8085> <WH8800> unto me, and eat <WH398> <WH8798> ye that which is good <WH2896>, and let your soul <WH5315> delight <WH6026> <WH8691> itself in fatness <WH1880>.

Incline <WH5186> <WH8685> your ear <WH241>, and come <WH3212> <WH8798> unto me: hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, and your soul <WH5315> shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>; and I will make <WH3772> <WH8799> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with you, even the sure <WH539> <WH8737> mercies <WH2617> of David <WH1732>.
Behold, I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> him for a witness <WH5707> to the people <WH3816>, a leader <WH5057> and commander <WH6680> <WH8764> to the people <WH3816>.

Behold, thou shalt call <WH7121> <WH8799> a nation <WH1471> that thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8799> not, and nations <WH1471> that knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not thee shall run <WH7323> <WH8799> unto thee because of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and for HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; for he hath glorified <WH6286> <WH8765> thee.
Seek <WH1875> <WH8798> ye the YY <WH3068> while he may be found <WH4672> <WH8736>, call <WH7121> <WH8798> ye upon him while he is near <WH7138>:

Let the wicked <WH7563> forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> his way <WH1870>, and the unrighteous <WH205> man <WH376> his thoughts <WH4284>: and let him return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and he will have mercy <WH7355> <WH8762> upon him; and to our 'Elohim <WH430>, for he will abundantly <WH7235> <WH8686> pardon <WH5545> <WH8800>.
For my thoughts <WH4284> are not your thoughts <WH4284>, neither are your ways <WH1870> my ways <WH1870>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

For as the heavens <WH8064> are higher <WH1361> <WH8804> than the earth <WH776>, so are my ways <WH1870> higher <WH1361> <WH8804> than your ways <WH1870>, and my thoughts <WH4284> than your thoughts <WH4284>.

For as the rain <WH1653> cometh down <WH3381> <WH8799>, and the snow <WH7950> from heaven <WH8064>, and returneth <WH7725> <WH8799> not thither, but watereth <WH7301> <WH8689> the earth <WH776>, and maketh it bring forth <WH3205> <WH8689> and bud <WH6779> <WH8689>, that it may give <WH5414> <WH8804> seed <WH2233> to the sower <WH2232> <WH8802>, and bread <WH3899> to the eater <WH398> <WH8802>:

So shall my word <WH1697> be that goeth forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of my mouth <WH6310>: it shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto me void <WH7387>, but it shall accomplish <WH6213> <WH8804> that which I please <WH2654> <WH8804>, and it shall prosper <WH6743> <WH8689> in the thing whereto I sent <WH7971> <WH8804> it.

For ye shall go out <WH3318> <WH8799> with joy <WH8057>, and be led forth <WH2986> <WH8714> with peace <WH7965>: the mountains <WH2022> and the hills <WH1389> shall break forth <WH6476> <WH8799> before <WH6440> you into singing <WH7440>, and all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall clap <WH4222> <WH8799> their hands <WH3709>.

Instead of the tshofar <WH5285> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> the fir tree <WH1265>, and instead of the brier <WH5636> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> the myrtle tree <WH1918>: and it shall be to the YY <WH3068> for a name <WH8034>, for an everlasting <WH5769> sign <WH226> that shall not be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735>.
